meanings.definition: People who believe that human existence is irrational and meaningless.
meanings.sent1: The absurdists in the group discussion questioned the purpose of life.
meanings.sent2: Many absurdists find solace in the chaos of the world.
meanings.sent3: The absurdists at the party joked about the futility of their daily routines.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a playground for the absurdists, exploring the depths of existential questions.
meanings.sent5: The absurdists painted a vivid picture of a world without reason.

meanings.definition: Those who create or appreciate absurd or nonsensical art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The absurdists gathered at the gallery to admire the unconventional artwork.
meanings.sent2: As an absurdist, she enjoyed reading surreal novels that challenged reality.
meanings.sent3: The absurdists giggled at the quirky humor in the play.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a canvas for the absurdists, painting vivid scenes of chaos and order.
meanings.sent5: The absurdists crafted a world where logic took a backseat to imagination.
